comment: What was John Dorsey s best move as GM ? Nick Chubb in Round ? There certainly weren t many to choose from , were there ?
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / move-02
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "John"
                        :op2 "Dorsey"))
            :ARG1 (c / company
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "General"
                        :op2 "Motors"))
            :ARG2 (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (g / good-02
                        :ARG1 m2)
                  :ARG3 (m3 / most)))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Nick"
                  :op2 "Chubb")
            :time (r / round-05))
      :snt3 (c2 / choose-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (m4 / many)
            :mod (c3 / certain)
            :location (t / there)
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)))

comment: Dorsey's teams won more games than the previous - year regime . I think he had plenty more good moves than just drafting Chubb . This team is more physical and has more speed than what he inherited .
amr:
# ::snt Dorsey's teams won more games than the previous - year regime . I think he had plenty more good moves than just drafting Chubb . This team is more physical and has more speed than what he inherited .

      :snt1 (w / win-01
            :ARG0 (t / team
                  :poss (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Dorsey")))
            :ARG2 (g / game
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91

                              :poss (r / regime
                                    :time (p2 / previous))))))
      :snt2 (t2 / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-03
                  :ARG0 (h3 / he)
                  :ARG1 (m3 / move-02
                        :ARG0 h3
                        :ARG1-of (g3 / good-02)
                        :ARG1-of (h4 / have-quant-91
                              :ARG3 (m4 / more
                                    :quant (p3 / plenty))
                              :ARG4 (d / draft-02
                                    :ARG0 h3
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Chubb"))
                                    :mod (j / just))))))
      :snt3 (a / and

                  :ARG2-of (h5 / have-degree-91

                              :mod (t4 / this))
                        :ARG3 (m5 / more)
                        :ARG4 (t5 / thing
                              :ARG1-of (ii2 / inherit-01
                                    :ARG0 h3))))
            :op2 (h6 / have-degree-91

                  :ARG2 (s / speed)
                  :ARG3 (m6 / more)
                  :ARG4 (t6 / thing
                        :ARG1-of ii2
                        :ARG0 h3))))
